item.title: Snacka Kubernetes - Neuvector
item.description: A summary of my "Snacka Kubernetes - Neuvector i praktionen" presentation, covering some of the things I consider important when running Neuvector in production.

item.title: Snacka Kubernetes - Supply Chain Security
item.description: A summary of my "Snacka Kubernetes - Supply Chain Security" presentation, with an overview of image and git commit signing.
